roadroller.objectmanager
Class GameObjectManager

java.lang.Object
  roadroller.objectmanager.GameObjectManager

public class GameObjectManager
extends java.lang.Object

GameObjectManager, manages all Objects and is responsible for the behavior of the game in the running mode. Includes the player and all sprites. Responds to key Input. Singleton Class

Author:
Felix, patrickfuerst

public void changeToLevel2()
Changes the Level. Changes the Background and the speed of the player, removes the old background and let«s the thread sleep for 1s.
